code: import React from"react";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import $ from"jquery";import"./NavItem.css";var NavItem=function NavItem(props){var NavItemClickHandler=function NavItemClickHandler(){if($(".nav-item-list").hasClass("showing")){$(".nav-item-list").removeClass("showing");}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"nav-item",onClick:NavItemClickHandler},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(NavLink,{className:props.className,to:props.to},props.children));};export default NavItem;
